Heading: Number of siblings
Value: One half brother, but raised as an only child

Heading: Raised by
Value: Both parents until 12, then father died, raised by mother

Heading: Parent’s marital status
Value: Father had a previous marriage, Bland raised by father and mother (father’s 2nd marriage) until father died when Bland was 12.

Heading: Physically abused?
Value: Yes. He claimed he was pinched by clothes pins.

Value: Maintenance mechanic for the American Legion

Heading: Mother’s occupation
Value: Worked at a local rubber plant

Value: 11 (dropped out three weeks prior to graduation)

Number of children
Value: Stepdaughters whom he molested and tortured

Value: When married with wives, some with his mother, and alone

Value: Yes. He attended AA meetings, but denied use on several occasions

Value: Yes, when ordered by the court, not on own

Heading: Time in forensic hospital?
Value: Hospitalized several times, longest was 7 years

Heading: Diagnosis

Value: Child molestation, rape, torture, kidnapping, robbery, assault

Value: Never able to prove other than Phoebe Ho, first suspected one was when he was 21

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Value: 51 when killed Phoebe Ho, first suspected killing at age 21

Value: Within a few miles of her home and school

Value: No, he died of natural causes before the execution.
